ble.cannotWriteWithoutResponse: This web browser does not support Web Bluetooth Write Characteristic Without Response. Flashing firmware will take a long time.
ble.gattServiceNotFound: Connected to hub but failed to get LEGO bootloader service. Try removing the "LEGO Bootloader" device in your OS Bluetooth settings, then try again.
ble.noWebBluetooth: This web browser does not support Web Bluetooth or it is not enabled.
ble.connectFailed: Unexpected error while trying to connect. Check console log and report the error.

editor.programChanged: The program was changed in another window. Do you want to delete this program and replace it with the new program?

serviceWorker.success: Content is cached for offline use.
serviceWorker.update: New content is available and will be used when all tabs for this page are closed.'
